name: re-uix
_scripts: scripts with an underline are probably broken and have not been tested

scripts._release: shadow-cljs -A:dev release app && npm run styles-release
scripts._styles-dev: onchange -o '> public/main.css && lightningcss --bundle public/main.css -o public/main.css' -i src/**/*.css -- cat src/**/*.css
scripts._styles-release: cat src/**/*.css > public/main.css && lightningcss --minify --bundle public/main.css -o public/main.css

_main: This property is used by Electron to find the entry point:
